subsection.name: Ideo Technologies
subsection.p: Ideo Technologies is a privately held company. It designs SweetDEV Solutions, including a Struts-based J2EE Framework, SweetDEV Framework, a Web application development environment, SweetDEV RIA (an Ajax tags library).

SweetDEV Solutions helps companies to reduce time and effort to build enterprise J2EE applications in a more efficient manner. The SweetDEV Solutions technology is used by hundred of developers worldwide in various companies.
For further information, visit our website at www.sweetdev-solutions.com.
